name: id
definition: Unique identifier within the IPSN Pathogen-Genomics-Surveillance Data-Standards Catalogue

name: name
definition: Name of the data standard within the IPSN Pathogen-Genomics-Surveillance Data-Standards Catalogue

name: URLs
definition: Main URLs to access information and material related to the data standard. This list should be parsimonious rather than exhaustive.

name: scopes
definition: Pathogens or use cases covered by the data standard

name: targets
definition: Genome regions covered by the data standard

name: formats
definition: Formats in which the data standard is available. This assumes a structured file. If the files provided are unstructured, select 'other', irrespective of the file format.

name: supporting_materials
definition: Material provided to make use of the data standard

name: developers
definition: Individuals or organizations developing the data standard

name: contacts
definition: Ways to contact the developers, e.g. emails, online forms, postal addresses.

name: comment
definition: Comments from the maintainers of the IPSN Pathogen-Genomics-Surveillance Data-Standards Catalogue on the data standard
